mapper.select: SELECT LogId , MngrId , ActinDt , ActinReasn , ActinType , ActinRslt , ActinFunc , InsId , InsDt , UptId , UptDt FROM TB_MngrLog WHERE LogId = #{logId}

SELECT LogId , MngrId , ActinDt , ActinReasn , ActinType , ActinRslt , ActinFunc , InsId , InsDt , UptId , UptDt FROM TB_MngrLog AS A WHERE 1=1 AND (IFNULL(#{actinType}, '') = '' OR A.ActinType = IFNULL(#{ActinType}) ORDER BY A.LogId DESC LIMIT #{paging.startRow}, #{paging.rowCntInPage}
